archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Connect:Direct Gateway
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Used by PODG to send files to certain 3rd parties, mainly banks:
IF29.1.007 Horizon AP Client File BCG to Bank Of Ireland Horizon APS Bank Of Ireland BCG00169.CIF IF29.1.015 Horizon AP Client File to Co-op Horizon APS Co-op UF003491.CIF ; UFP01663.CIF IF29.1.035 Horizon AP Client File to NCR Horizon APS NCR PAG02432.CIF ; ATM00786.CIF IF29.1.070 Horizon AP Client File to Santander Horizon APS Santander ACG02678.CIF IF29.1.071 Horizon AP Client File to Santander Horizon APS Santander XD002766.CIF IF29.1.085 Horizon AP Client File to Aviva Horizon APS Aviva POL02387.CIF IF29.1.086 Horizon AP Client File to Bank Of Ireland Horizon APS Bank Of Ireland POF03570.CIF transformed to POF03570.DFT IF29.1.087 Horizon AP Client File to Bank Of Ireland Horizon APS Bank Of Ireland POF03570.CIF IF29.1.088 Horizon AP Client File to Bank Of Ireland Horizon APS Bank Of Ireland PLO00620.CIF transformed to ZBBK.HORIZON.GB.FILE IF29.1.089 Horizon AP Client File to Bank Of Ireland Horizon APS Bank Of Ireland BCD00108.CIF transformed to ZBBK.HORIZON.BOINI.FILE IF301 POLSAP Co-Op encashments to Santander POLSAP Santander COOPnnnn.txt - Co-Op encashments IF305 POLSAP A&L summaries to Santander POLSAP Santander PSFAL00nn.EBC renamed by PODG to LRS.FLEAK83.SA00 - A&L summaries
